Description: Number of replicated samples per condition
A concatenated value of soil type and biocharcoal type (useful for grouping)
Incubation day since start of experiment
Total CO2 Respired from Soil and Biochar since Previous Measure (mol CO2)
Fraction of Respiration Contributed by Biochar (unitless)
Gravimetric water content of soil and biochar mixture (g/g)
N concentration as nitrate from 2M KCl extract (mg N-NH4/kg soil)
